snippet: The deal would increase the market presence of Platform Specialty’s specialty chemicals business, and represents a 49 percent premium to Alent’s closing price on Friday.
abstract: DealBook Online; Platform Specialty Products Corporation announces agreement to acquire Alent for 1.35 billion pounds, around $2.1 billion.
lead_paragraph: The deal would increase the market presence of Platform Specialty’s specialty chemicals business, and represents a 49 percent premium to Alent’s closing price on Friday.

headline.main: Platform Specialty Products to Acquire Alent for $2.1 Billion
